data.text:
Calvin Leroy (C.L.) Harris, Jr., 55, of Hahira, passed away on Friday July 10, 2020 at his residence. He was born in Homestead, FL on October 6, 1964 to Joann Heath Harris and the late Calvin Leroy Harris, Sr. C.L. was a member of Hahira First Baptist Church and was employed at Elead.

C.L. is survived by his wife Becky Rowntree Harris, of Hahira; his sons and two daughters in law, Hobie and Caitlin Harris, and their daughter Harper, Wyatt and Sylvia Harris, and their daughter Dolly, Bryce Harris, and Cooper Harris, all of Hahira; his mother Joann Harris of Valdosta; his sister Mitzi and Hubby Brooks of Valdosta; his step siblings, Elizabeth and Tom Maugeri, of Bethlehem, GA, and Todd Harris, of Texas; his parents in law, Hardy and Gwen Rowntree, of Hahira; and numerous special nieces and nephews. He was preceded in death by his father, Calvin Leroy Harris, Sr., of Jacksonville, FL, his stepfather, Clinton Harris, of Valdosta, and his maternal and paternal grandparents.

A funeral service for Calvin will be held at 10 a.m. on Tuesday, July 14, 2020 in the chapel of the Carson McLane Funeral Home. Burial will follow at Friendship Cemetery. Condolences to the family may be conveyed online at www.mclanecares.com. Carson McLane Funeral Home.
